thread.title: Life on Mars? NASA says planet appears to have flowing water
thread.title_full: Life on Mars? NASA says planet appears to have flowing water

title: Life on Mars? NASA says planet appears to have flowing water
text: Life on Mars? NASA says planet appears to have flowing water Monday, 28 September 2015 (2 minutes ago) Mars appears to have flowing rivulets of salty water, at least in the summer, scientists reported Monday in a finding that could have major implications for the possibility of life on the red planet. NASA says it has solves a major Mars mystery — and it’s big. Recent related news Mars appears to have flowing streams of salty water, at least in the summer, scientists reported Monday in a finding that could have major implications for the... ChicagoTribune 47 minutes ago - World NASA announced today that Mars has seasonal rivers of flowing water, increasing the odds that the planet can sustain some forms of life.
